name: Counter War Mission
description:
Counter War Mission is a sniper shooting games in which the soldier fight with the enemy. It is a First Person Shooter - FPS game. The game setting starts from a garage and move on to a shipping yard. You are a conqueror a soldier a sniper your mission is to liberate the area from brutal enemies. You are alone in this mission much like a silent commando action, you have to complete different missions without raising too much alarm. Just locate the target, aim and shoot. This game has long range sniper shooting for some missions, you will have to takeout enemies from long distances which are mounted on cranes and building tops. This is a new shooting games of 2017 built for top fps loving users. As you complete missions the difficulty of the game increase, you cannot relax and calm down for a bit there is continuous action throughout the game. This is one of the best shooting games graphics with high quality. You have been left alone behind enemy lines to clear the area. You are one of the top commandos in the battalion and no one was willing to take up the mission so command handpicked you for this mission.

There are round about 20+ missions with every mission difficult from the previous one. There are categories of terrorists, take head shots, kill them with katana or with a revolver, or you can also buy different gun from the arsenal. There are several different guns – AK-47, Assault rifle, snayper etc. You can buy these guns if you have enough coins. There are some missions where you have to save hostages and kill the terrorists. You have to takedown enemy bosses to clear the area. You have to be quick and precise because when you are in their target they leave no chance to hurt you or to kill you. There are garages, tall cranes where enemies are mounted to spot any intruder there are shipping containers where there is contraband ready to be smuggled. The smugglers drop the contraband in the garage where it is packed and made ready for shipment and then shifted into the containers.

This is a gun shooting games with mission new 2017 in which you have to buy guns, you can buy armors and health boasters, you can buy gun magazines from the shop for a specific gun be careful to stack up you gear before entering the battlefield. Counter War Mission has been designed to be the best shooting games in the world with mature graphics and high end environment.

How to Play
• Download and open the game
• Go to the shop and buy the necessary gear
• Select a mission
• Observe the environment and locate enemies
• Clear the area
• Keep on completing different missions until you complete them all

Game Features
• High end graphics
• Mature environment
• Difficult and challenging missions
• Great sound effects
• Great image effects
• Extensive gun shop
• Several guns in the arsenal to pick from
• You can also pick enemy guns

You will love this game as it is different from other shooting games because of its mission type, game setting and the great arsenal. The user will wish that the developers made more games like Counter War Mission. We guarantee you that you won’t be disappointed after playing this game.

Our company’s main focus is user experience and we put a lot of efforts in enhancing the user experience. We try to bring real shooting games experience to the users. We work really hard on our R&D so that the users should not be disappointed.

Download Counter War Mission and live a real life sniper shooting fps experience. This game is absolutely free to download and to play. This is shooting offline games so you do not need internet, just download it from play store and voila enjoy the rest of the gaming experience.
